DisplayForm.Script:
<?xml version="1 0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<UiScreen>
<Title>Multi UI</Title> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./card_auth.asp" ></Op> </Operations> <IoScreen>
<IoObject> <Title>idscanner</Title> <Description>Swipe card</Description> <IdScanner id="card"> <Label>Idscanner test</Label> </IdScanner> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>Message</Title> <Description>Message Description</Description> <Message>Message</Message> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>CopyNum</Title> <Description>NumArea Description</Description> <NumericalArea id="numericalarea_id20" cpos="Head"> <InitValue>10</InitValue> <MinValue>0</MinValue> <MaxValue>100</MaxValue> <Mask>false</Mask> </NumericalArea> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>Quality</Title> <Selection id="printQuality" multiple="false"> <Item value="2" selected="true"> <Label>Photo</Label> </Item> <Item value="1" selected="false"> <Label>Normal</Label> </Item> </Selection> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>Letter Size</Title> <Selection id="printPaperSize" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>Letter</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>A4</Label> </Item>
<Item value="3" selected="false"> <Label>4"x6"</Label> </Item>
<Item value="4" selected="false"> <Label>5"x7"</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>PaperType</Title> <Selection id="printPaperType" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>Plain Paper</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>Inkjet Paper</Label> </Item>
<Item value="3" selected="false"> <Label>Brother BP61</Label> </Item>
<Item value="4" selected="false"> <Label>Brother BP71</Label> </Item>
<Item value="5" selected="false"> <Label>Other Glossy</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject> <IoObject>
<Title>Border On/Off</Title> <Selection id="printBorderless" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>On</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>Off</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject>
</IoScreen> </UiScreen>
